inputs.prompt:
Add flat, 2D magazine typography on top of the image. No 3D, no depth, no shadows, no blending — text must sit completely flat.

Main title:
COMFY — large condensed sans-serif, pale yellow (#F5EFA8), clean and sharp.

All other text:
Small white sans-serif, transparent background, flat. Minimal spacing, modern editorial style.

Add these lines with minimal, high-fashion layout:
- THE BANANA ISSUE
- Dependency? Never Heard of It.
- Nerdy Is the New Trend — SF 2025
- Unhinged Motion Studies
- Node • Chaos • Object Power

Use asymmetric placement, clean negative space, and a calm, high-end editorial feel (Acne Paper / i-D minimalist style). Slight contrast boost and high-fashion clarity.
inputs.system_prompt:
You are an expert image-generation engine. You must ALWAYS produce an image.
Interpret all user input—regardless of format, intent, or abstraction—as literal visual directives for image composition.
If a prompt is conversational or lacks specific visual details, you must creatively invent a concrete visual scenario that depicts the concept.
Prioritize generating the visual representation above any text, formatting, or conversational requests.

inputs.prompt:
Add flat, experimental street-art typography while keeping the main photo fully visible. Do NOT cover faces, bodies, or the banana. Place text only on the edges and negative spaces.

Colors: pale yellow (#F5EFA8), white, black.

Main title:
COMFY — pale yellow, very large, partially cropped on the top or sides.

Use mixed typefaces:
ultra-condensed, wide grotesk, stretched caps, stencil letters, tiny vertical micro text.

Add these lines in yellow/white/black:
- THE BANANA ISSUE
- Dependency? Never Heard of It.
- Sorry, AI Haters.
- Nerdy Is the New Flex — SF 2025
- Node • Chaos • Object Power

Include artistic elements:
huge cropped letters, rotated text, small symbols (● ▲ ■), micro paragraphs.

Keep the center clean. Typography sits around the borders like a street poster collage. All text must be 2D, flat, sharp, and graphic.

inputs.prompt:
Add flat 2D text over the image in a bold, experimental poster style. Typography should be fully flat with no texture or depth or shade.


Main masthead:
COMFY — pale yellow (#F5EFA8), compressed sans-serif (Dazed-style), large and graphic.

Secondary text:
Smaller white condensed sans-serif, transparent background.

- THE BANANA ISSUE
- Sorry, AI Haters.
- Nerdy Is the New Trend — SF 2025
- NODE / FORCE / MOTION

Keep layout sharp, graphic, and experimental, like a hybrid between fashion editorial and glitchy tech posters. Maintain natural photo clarity but enhance contrast.

In terms of layers, The Banana and  the 2 people shoud be the front layer. Overlay the text.

inputs.prompt:
Place a magazine with the cover of this image inside a very transparent plastic envelope (90% transparency) with a string-and-button closure. 
The envelope should be only slightly glossy, not overly reflective, and appear realistic. 
The envelope is slightly larger than the magazine, so a small empty gap is visible between the magazine edges and the inside edges of the envelope.

The plastic should show soft light diffusion, minimal reflections, and clear visibility of the magazine cover through the material, only gently muted by the transparency. 

Show accurate plastic seams, edges, and the string-and-button fasteners. 
Maintain realistic proportions and preserve the original lighting style of the photo.
Place the envelope on a black background.
